title: LMS-Based Mobile Microlearning Design and Implementation for Mechanical Engineering Microteaching

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational Mechanical Engineering Theory and Basic Experimental Methods
context.additional_context: Learners are adult university students familiar with digital environments, requiring flexible learning utilizing mobile devices in BYOD environments

learning_goals: Step-by-step explanations of mechanical engineering laboratory procedures can be provided using LMS-based microteaching modules
Core concepts can be summarized and delivered within five minutes through mobile microlearning content
Microteaching techniques can be continuously improved based on formative assessment feedback

resources: Mechanical engineering lab equipment image database

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
